questions.question: The name of civil rights pioneer Viola Desmond made history this week in Canada. Why?

choices.answer: She will become Canada's first female finance minister
She will be the first Canadian woman on currency
She is honored on Canada's newest $10 bill
A new documentary about her came out this week

questions.question: What surprising news has Elon Musk announced this week?

choices.answer: Space Man and car returned to Earth's orbit
Space Man is halfway to Mars already
SpaceX Mars rocket ready to go on short test trips in 2019

questions.question: The first known penguin selfie in history went viral this week. Where was it taken?

choices.answer: In Antarctica
In a zoo in New Zealand
In Arctica

questions.question: In China, they agreed to build a giant panda conservation park. How big will it be?

choices.answer: More than two times the size of Yellowstone National Park
About the size of Manhattan
About the size of Austin, Texas
2 million hectares (5 million acres)

questions.question: A new report showed that this year's Arctic winter has been...

choices.answer: ... the warmest in history
... the richest in snow in history
... the coldest in history
... record warm. Arctic sea ice shrank by 62,000 sq miles.

questions.question: The Greek soccer Superleague has been indefinitely suspended because...

choices.answer: Massive snowfall in Athens
Several players have tested positive for doping
A team's president tried to confront a referee
A coach started a fight with another team's goalkeeper
